name: Beat the Stick
description:
Beat the Stick is a Side-Scrolling, 2D, Pixel-Art style, Beat em Up game with Stickman Characters

Noir City is on the verge of destruction as government threatens to Nuke several areas in the city. Members of the infamous "Mohawk Gang" roam the streets in fear, beating anyone in their rage. Police too are on the look out

You are a Thug trying to Escape this Chaos

Use your Fighting and Special Skills to knock enemies down and Escape this Hell

Features Include:-

  • Classic Beat em Up Gameplay
  • Special Powers and Moves
  • Time-Bound objectives
  • Variety of Enemies

Remember, Time is Ticking and you've got to Escape

Try to escape the Impending Doom in Beat the Stick
